original_definition: 'generation schedule' means a schedule representing the electricity generation of a power generating module or of a group of power generating modules;
generated_definition: 'generation schedule' means a schedule specifying the start and end times of a generation unit's availability for the purpose of selling electricity to the tso.

Article 3: ‘generation schedule’ means a schedule representing the electricity generation of a power generating module or of a group of power generating modules;
Article 92: 5.   When generation schedules and consumption schedules are submitted to the TSO pursuant to Article 111, the time resolution of the availability statuses shall be consistent with those schedules.
5.   Whengeneration schedules andconsumption schedules are submitted to the TSO pursuant to Article 111, the time resolution of theavailability statuses shall be consistent with those schedules.
